title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions:
Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in the shade Putty Matte. This eyeshadow stick offers highly pigmented color in a light taupe-pink shade, with a matte finish. The waterproof and crease-proof formula ensures long-lasting wear.

Formulated with beneficial ingredients such as Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax, this eyeshadow stick not only adds color to your eyelids but also provides antioxidant protection. It is suitable for delicate sensitive skin and can even improve skin tone and texture.

With its crème-to-powder formula, this eyeshadow stick glides on smoothly and effortlessly. No application tool is required, and it comes with a built-in smudger for easy blending. Simply sweep the stick directly onto your eyelids, use the smudger or your fingers to blend, and remember to blend before the formula sets.

The Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick is available in three finish options - Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic. Choose from a variety of shades to suit your preference, with a total of 30 shade options to choose from.

Enhance your eye makeup game with this versatile and long-lasting eyeshadow stick. Get the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte today!

Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in the shade Putty Matte. This highly pigmented eyeshadow stick is perfect for creating stunning eye looks with a matte finish. The light taupe-pink color adds a touch of elegance to any makeup look.

Choose from multiple shades including Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic to suit your style and preferences. The crème-to-powder formula ensures easy application and a long-lasting, waterproof finish. It is also crease-proof, making it ideal for all-day wear.

Enriched with Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax, this eyeshadow stick not only enhances your beauty but also provides nourishment and antioxidant protection to delicate and sensitive skin. It even helps improve skin tone and texture, leaving you with a flawless complexion.

No application tool is required as this eyeshadow stick comes with a built-in smudger, allowing you to effortlessly blend and create different eye looks. Simply coat the smudger with color, sweep the stick directly onto your eyelids, and use the smudger or your fingers to blend. For best results, blend before the formula sets.

Try the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte and experience the convenience and beauty it offers.
